name: Mirror Marble Puzzle - 1 hour game jam #68
name_original: Mirror Marble Puzzle - 1 hour game jam #68
description:
Simple game made for 1hgj #68 - Mirror Theme

Marble Mirror Puzzle

This game has been made for the One Hour Game Jam #68 with Mirror Theme

ControlsUse arrows to move both marbles. Reach green areas with both marbles at the same time to solve the puzzle.
